docs.lead_paragraph: Abscam-style bribery that buys legislation outright may be the exception in Congress. But the evidence grows that perfectly legal campaign contributions are having the same effect. Special interests are buying laws they like. It's hard to find a clearer example than the present effort of professionals to gain exemption from scrutiny by the Federal Trade Commission.
